description: An Axe Haft is the prefix upgrade for an axe

items.name: Barbed Axe Haft
items.description: Lengthens Bleeding duration on foes by 33%

items.name: Cruel Axe Haft
items.description: Lengthens Deep Wound duration on foes by 33%

items.name: Crippling Axe Haft
items.description: Lengthens Crippled duration on foes by 33%

items.name: Heavy Axe Haft
items.description: Lengthens Weakness duration on foes by 33%

items.name: Poisonous Axe Haft
items.description: Lengthens Poison duration on foes by 33%

description: A Staff Head is the prefix upgrade for a staff.

items.name: Adept Staff Head
items.description: Halves casting time of spells of item's attribute (Chance: 10-20%)

description: An Axe Grip is the suffix upgrade for an axe.

items.name: Axe Grip of Axe Mastery
items.description: Axe Mastery +1 (10...20% chance while using skills)

description: A Hammer Grip is the suffix upgrade for a hammer.

items.name: Hammer Grip of Hammer Mastery

description: A Staff Wrapping is the suffix upgrade for a staff.
A Wand Wrapping is the suffix upgrade for a wand.

items.name: Wand Wrapping of Memory
items.description: Halves skill recharge of spells of item's attribute (Chance: 10...20%)

description: A Shield Handle is the suffix upgrade for a shield.
A Focus Core is the suffix upgrade for a focus.

items.name: Focus Core of Aptitude
items.description: Halves casting time of item's attribute spells (Chance: 10-20%)

description: Inscriptions that can be applied to any weapons.
Inscriptions that can be applied to martial weapons.
Inscriptions that can be applied to spellcasting weapons.

items.name: Aptitude not Attitude
items.enhancement: Halves casting time of spells of item's attribute

description: Inscriptions that can be applied to focus items or shields.

items.name: Fear Cuts Deeper
items.enhancement: Reduces Bleeding duration on you by 20%

items.name: I Can See Clearly Now
items.enhancement: Reduces Blind duration on you by 20%

items.name: Swift as the Wind
items.enhancement: Reduces Crippled duration on you by 20%

items.name: Soundness of Mind
items.enhancement: Reduces Dazed duration on you by 20%

items.name: Strength of Body
items.enhancement: Reduces Deep Wound duration on you by 20%

items.name: Cast Out the Unclean
items.enhancement: Reduces Disease duration on you by 20%

items.name: Pure of Heart
items.enhancement: Reduces Poison duration on you by 20%

items.name: Only the Strong Survive
items.enhancement: Reduces Weakness duration on you by 20%

description: Inscriptions that can be applied to focus items.

items.name: Inscription Forget Me Not
items.enhancement: Halves skill recharge of spells of item's attribute
